'''Sandbearer Wood'''  is obtained by cutting down Sandbearer Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==How to Obtain==
Sandbearer Trees are most commonly found in [[Minlin]] and [[Lisha]], but can sometimes be found in other areas of Liyue. They are also found in [[The Chasm]].

{{Craft Usage}}

==Other Uses==
* 12 Sandbearer Wood is also used for the World Quest [[Hereafter: All is Well]].
